title: [Briarmoon Cove, Makiri Market]
description: At the edge of the bazaar the storefronts are squarer, and the architecture is much simpler in design, but showy finery prevails in the elaborate scrollwork and vibrant coloring of the window displays.  One central shop draws inspiration from the shore, brandishing iridescent mother-of-pearl and sea glass mosaic panels around the doorway.
